aboutusdata.content: Seamless Healthcare Journey: We address your needs at every step, from travel and accommodation to medical treatment as well as Wellness trip.
Holistic Wellness: Qonaq rejuvenates you with customized wellness programs and retreats that include yoga, meditation, spirituality and much more.
Affordable, Top-Notch Care: Stick to affordable medical and wellness care with Qonaq. You may also have access to financial assistance in exceptional cases via crowd-funding and NGO partners.
Heal and explore: Experience various destinations and dive deep into Indian cultural heritage with Qonaq.
Guidance at Every Step: At Qonaq, one never walks alone. Our team of healthcare professionals will provide guidance making your experience hassle-free.
Healthcare at Your Fingertips: Our telemedicine services make follow-ups and support easy and convenient, no matter wherever you are around the globe.
Post-recovery support: Our telemedicine services make follow-ups and support easy and convenient, no matter wherever you are around the globe.
